ygData.subject: Re: najena faction
ygData.msgSnippet: so ro faction and temple faction are not the same. i killed ortallius a few hundred times and the knight likes me just fine. everyone has indifferent temple
ygData.messageBody:
so ro faction and temple faction are not the same. i killed ortallius a few
hundred times and the knight likes me just fine.

everyone has indifferent temple faction, the only way i know of killing this
faction is hailing the efreeti in the basement of the temple...which can be
repaired by killing shadowedmen if im not mistaken.

btw - am i the only one who enjoys negative faction adjustments? rather than
attempt to "fix" my faction with the many residents of antonica i've done my
best ruin it.(note: 1.) there is no end to the usefulness of gather shadows
and feign death 2.) there is suprisingly good lvl 25-50 xp to be had within
neriak, freeport, oggok, qeynos and most other cities...these zones are also
a hell of a lot more "fun" than your run of the mill guks and soluseks).

i can proudly say that, at the moment i am dubious or worse everywhere i've
been other than my own guild hall...though, i was rather dissappointed to
find that there is nothing beyond "scowls". a "hunts you across the zone"
would have been interesting.

kg

- if you think it's wrong for a troll to kill de...they overcharge me in
shops 8) and captain n'farre killed me when i was lv6, leaving an indelible
mark on my young hateful mind (an orc runner attacked me).

><snip>
>| From: Grant Vanderhule <vandergm@...>
>|
>| luckily, the undead knight (the guy who makes shadow knight armor) has
>| temple of solusek ro faction, NOT najena faction. so you can kill stuff
>in
>| najena to your hearts content and he'll still like you. HOWEVER, since he
>| appears in drelzna's room... it would be nice to have high najena faction
>so
>| you can survive the trip down there a bit more easily!
>|
>| Beld Demonblade
>| Fennin Ro
>|
><snip>
>
>What is the best way to adjust Solusek Ro Faction? I know the named Orc in
>South Ro does. Anything else? like a HUGE faction adjustment? What is the
>starting/minimum Faction needed for this Undead Knight?
>
>BTW.... Thank you very much for such a quick answer
>
